description: Table that stores series assignment related information as well as information on series answer record status.

columns.name: SERIES_ANS_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the series answer record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the status of the series answer record if it is not active.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: SERIES_ID
columns.description: This column stores the ID of the series answer record.

columns.name: SERIES_ID_SERIES_NAME
columns.description: The name for the questionnaire series record.

columns.name: SERIES_CSN
columns.description: This column stores the contact date (DAT) for the series answer record.

columns.name: SERIES_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the questionnaire series type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient Entered Questionnaire Series

columns.name: SERIES_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the status of the series answer record if it is active.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Completed


Disabled - Provider


Disabled - Patient Opted Out


Disabled - Found New Treatment


Disabled - Batch Job


Disabled - Patient Merge


Disabled - Contact Mover


Disabled - Procedure Pass


Disabled - Patient Expired


Disabled - Research Activity Retraction


Pending Enable

columns.name: ORDERED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: If a series is ordered through Order Entry or through a BestPractice Advisory, this column stores who ordered it for future message routing purposes.

columns.name: SERIES_PAT_ID
columns.description: To store ID (EPT id) of the patient who is answering this questionnaire series.

columns.name: HQW_CREATION_DT
columns.description: This column stores the date the series answer record was created.

columns.name: INIT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the encounter where this series is assigned to the user. This item will be empty if the series was assigned from Reporting Workbench.

columns.name: PARENT_SRS_ANS_ID
columns.description: This column stores the ID of the parent questionnaire series answer record.

columns.name: PREV_SRS_ANS_ID
columns.description: This column stores the ID of the previous anchor event questionnaire series answer record.

columns.name: LINKED_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item stores the encounter this questionnaire series is linked to. If the series is linked to an encounter, then the contact date (DAT) of the encounter will be used for evaluating anchor event rules and extensions.

columns.name: LINKED_PROC_PASS_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the Procedure Pass linked to this series. This will only be populated if the series is assigned using the Procedure Pass workflow.

columns.name: ASSIGNING_ORD_ID
columns.description: This item stores the order that assigned this questionnaire series.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the linked patient-study association if it is linked to an association.
